pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Reduce example names to fix build on Windows

content.raw: Interesting that examples are being built by the top-level `CMakeLists`. That's different from (all?) other Ignition projects. Could make the examples independent of the project itself? Dependencies, even when building from source, shouldn't need to build them,
content.html: Interesting that examples are being built by the top-level CMakeLists. That's different from (all?) other Ignition projects. Could make the examples independent of the project itself? Dependencies, even when building from source, shouldn't need to build them,
